programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Turkey: Life on the Edge

programme.desc: Youre invited to the Lebanese-themed instant restaurant of Adelaide cousins, Lama & Sarah. While this family feud tastes good for some, will a night in the kitchen end belly up?!

programme.title: The New Detectives: Patterns Of Guilt
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Random Targets
programme.desc: Most victims of multiple murderers are meticulously chosen because of a mutual connection with the killer or because they match an intricate set of criteria that fits the killer's MO.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Left At The Scene
programme.desc: The tiniest residue left at the scene can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Flames Of Justice
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Face Of Tragedy
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates with a blind taste test; Ramsay presents an unexpected challenge in order to determine who gets immunnity.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chef with the best dish earns immunity; the chefs prepare a meal for TV host Maria Menounos and actor Jeremy Sisto; one team's service flags during dinner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the contestants' ability to communicate and work together with a three entre relay race, with the winners getting a helicopter tour and a caviar tasting.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon reunites the contenders with their loved ones before challenging them to jazz up some basic cuts of meat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team of previous winners returns to challenge the remaining contestants; each team designs its own menus for dinner service.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a wild 60's inspired show truck. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues on a wild 60's inspired show truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage: Ten Ton Truck
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a vintage military transport truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1929 Ford Roadster Pickup

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1954 Chevy

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel looks back on the Best Builds of season 1

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog attack has dire consequences. The Andromeda is destroyed, Trance and Dylan are presumed the only survivors and Dylan escapes into the route of ages.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan ends up on Seefra, where the superstitious population has no technology.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka is dumped on Seefra after the Andromeda is stolen, and Dylan must prove the ship is his.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Still on Seefra, Dylan finds Harper, who has adjusted to life there.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: It turns out Doyle is an android, built by Harper to contain Rommie's core programming.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka wins a prize from a radio DJ, learns the truth about Seefra and locates the Meethus Diagram.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughters fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Otautau toddler Amber-Lee, aged two and a half, vanished from Kingston at the southern tip of Lake Wakatipu on October 17, 1992.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Best
programme.desc: A STORY: When The Colonel is stolen, Regan goes out of her way to help a 14 year old sheep duffer, as a way of assuaging her guilt over the dead miner's families.B STORY: Alex asks Stevie to be his best man...and Stevie ends up as Fiona's bridesmaid.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Trouble With Harry
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi believes she has killed Harry Ryan in a car accident. Facing manslaughter charges, it is later revealed that Harry died of a heart attack.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Legend of Harry Ryan
programme.desc: A STORY: Alex learns the real story of Harry's life - an orphan, abandoned by his adoptive parents and determined to create a new name and life. The Ryan empire is based on a myth.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Chances
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi's 'father' Kevin returns wanting to get his daughter back - but Jodi is devastated to learn he is using her for her inheritance money.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Stevie discovers that Fiona is lying about being pregnant. Racing to stop the wedding, Stevie is too late - Fiona has fast-tracked the ceremony before Stevie can tell Alex.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Life of Riley
programme.desc: When brumbies are found shot dead, the Drovers girls suspect Riley, a handsome stranger. Sandra moves back into Killarney, convinced she is carrying out Harry's legacy. Moira and Regan go into a fuel carting business together.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is Americas largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out its really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJs Pets is one of the nations oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and shes determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the companys mission of selling fun.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Little Drummer Boy
programme.desc: TAPS has received an urgent call for help from a Chicago community center whose patrons are being chased away by a variety of menacing spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Rockets Red Scare
programme.desc: TAPS travels back in time, to the 1700's to investigate the renowned USS Constitution, \\"Old Ironsides\\", which is docked in Boston, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Alcatraz
programme.desc: For the 100thepisode of Ghost Hunters, the team is allowed private access to Alcatraz Island, a dream come true for paranormal teams.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghostly Refuge
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Oswego, New York to investigate the renowned Fort Ontario. TAPS has investigated many forts, but never one that once served as a sanctuary for Jewish refugees during World War II.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbias Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR is en-route to rescue a snowmobiler whos crashed and tumbled 35 metres down a mine shaft.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Penticton SAR helicopter long lines a driver off the roof of his car in the middle of an icy river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR searches for two military pilots who crashed a T-33 jet in the Callaghan Valley. But theres a catch the pilots have been missing for over 50 years.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR enlists bystanders to help rescue an injured man perched on a log in the middle of a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and cant keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her hot girl summer. Not only that, but he doesnt trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isnt ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that arent there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhans bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacobys mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sonas life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burning Up
programme.desc: Lou's new business relationship with Matt starts to unravel when a botched job puts a serious strain on the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy Gets Beat Up
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou see the signs of the bad economy first-hand when a rich couple willing give up their late-model Landcruiser. Then, Matt and Sonia need to contend with a spoiled princess whose daddy forgot to pay the bill on her Jetta.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah reclaim a riding mower from a housewife and her grab-happy husband. Then, Sonia and Matt head out on a scorcher of an afternoon for a repossession. Will they be able to beat both the heat and a pair of geriatric debtors?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work.

programme.title: Operation Repo: This Is No Fantasy
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah get a tip from a spotter that leads them to a late model sedan with cans tied to the bumper and an angry bride in the passenger side. Next, Matt has to step in when Froy starts to lose it with a group of fantasy football players.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt Vs. Sonia
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy respond to a tip from an informant and wind up in the middle of an epic story of intrigue, betrayal, and drunk girls fighting each other. Then, a high-class croquet party gets interrupted when Matt and Lou come through to repossess..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped in their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Call for Help
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.

programme.title: Operation Repo: I Don't Know What That Is
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy crash a raucous brew-fest to sneak an ATV away from a crowd of tipsy revelers. Then, Matt and Lou come face-to-face with a fraternity prank gone awry - these college kids have a sledgehammer, and they're not afraid to use it.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Pleasantries
programme.desc: Preston gives Karen pause when he shows up at her salon with a friend. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Night Game
programme.desc: Karen attempts to stop Andi from falling back into her old ways when it comes to relationships. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Life, Soul, And Heart
programme.desc: Zac may find himself in serious problems as a mysterious woman appears and Karen confesses a huge secret. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Hard To Get
programme.desc: Andi comes to the realization that the gifts from Gary might not be worth the stipulations that they come with. (S4, ep6)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Moving On Up
programme.desc: Andi is forced to look at her current relationships and make some hard choices. (S4, ep7)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Sister Circle

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the Worlds Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the worlds greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: Arthur: The World Record/The Cave
programme.desc: Why is Buster walking backwards and Muffy not talking? They're trying to set world records of course! Then, Arthur thinks his class trip to the Clark Caves will be really cool--but won't it be dark in there?

programme.title: Arthur: Mom and Dad Have A Great Big Fight/D.W.'s Perfect Wish
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad fight over spilled milk, Arthur and D.W. fear the worst. Is it Arthur's fault or D.W.'s? Then, turning five is a major, big deal event! But D.W. worries that she fribbled away her preschool years on meaningless pursuits.

programme.title: Arthur: Pets and Pests/Go Fly a Kite
programme.desc: There's a mouse loose in the Read home! And D.W. wants it goneNOW! When traps fail, Arthur enlists the help of an expert mouse catcher. While playing in the park, Binky, Muffy, and Ladonna stumble upon an abandoned kite.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Breathless/The Fright Stuff
programme.desc: Will Buster's friends treat him the same after they learn he has asthma? Prankster have arrived in Elwood City--just in time for the "Scare Your Pants Off" costume party! It's boys vs. girls in what becomes a great big battle of the pranks.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky's Music Madness/Brain Freeze
programme.desc: Everyone loves the Bang on a Can All-Stars, a funky experimental music group that's touring around Elwood City. Everyone that is, except Binky. A new ice cream shop has just opened up across the block. Will Brain's shop be able to survive?

programme.title: Arthur: Love Notes For Muffy/D.W. Blows The Whistle
programme.desc: When Muffy tries to bribe the judges at the school science fair, Francine and The Brain plot revenge. And D.W., a newly-deputized Junior Safety Officer, has a reputation for being a strict enforcer of the rules--well, OK, a tattle-tale.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Isn't Buying It/One Ornery Critter
programme.desc: Aliens, conspiracy theories, the megatoad--Buster believes in everything, until his favorite show gets cancelled for false reporting. Dogs love Arthur! Well, except Carrot Cake. Can Arthur win over this picky pup?

programme.title: Arthur: Bully for Binky/Misfortune Teller
programme.desc: Is Binky Barnes really the most disgusting, nasty, horrible person on the planet, or is he just misunderstood? Next, what's got four sides and the answer to everything? Prunella's cootie catcher!

programme.title: Arthur: The Curse of the Grebes/Arthur Changes Gears
programme.desc: The Elwood City Grebes haven't won the Baseball Championship since 1918. But with the addition of three players, the title is finally within reach. Arthur finally saves enough money to buy the bike of his dreams!

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Jews Who Fought for Hitler
programme.desc: In Hitlers Germany, those with Jewish ancestry faced harsh Nuremberg Laws. Full Jews faced death; Mischlinge endured discrimination, job bans. Some, like Helmut Schmidt, unaware of heritage, found protectors like Milch in high places.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Grand Mufti
programme.desc: The controversy surrounding Mohammad Amin al-Husayni, stems from his Nazi collaboration. He recruited Bosnian Muslims and advocated for a Palestinian homeland with Nazi help. His diaries reveal awareness of the Holocaust and anti-Semitic sentiments.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The IRA Conspiracy
programme.desc: During WWII, the IRA's "S Plan" aimed to bomb Britain, drawing German support to weaken the British. "Operation Green" and "Plan Kathleen" envisioned IRA aiding a German invasion of Northern Ireland, but both failed due to bungling and infighting.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Arajs Kommando
programme.desc: Viktor Arajs, a Latvian, played a significant role in the Holocaust, collaborating with the Nazis to eliminate Jews. Leading the Arajs Kommando, he orchestrated the killings of around 30,000 Jews. Arajs justified his actions as patriotic defense.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: Vidkun Quisling
programme.desc: Vidkun Quisling, once honored for diplomacy, turned traitor by collaborating with Nazis. His bid for power in Norway failed, relegated by Germans. Despite being named "fuehrer," his reign led to repression until his hanging post-Nazi defeat.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Whitney & Bre
programme.desc: Whitney met Brenell on a LGBT website four years ago and is head-over-heels in love. Brenell refuses to video chat with her, and Whitney is desperate to know why. Nev and Max investigate.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Jaylin is prepared to sacrifice a lifelong friendship and promising videogame career to be with a woman he's never even spoken to on the phone. (S5, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Cassie & Steve
programme.desc: Cassie was on a downward spiral until she got a friend request from a rapper named Steve. Two and a half years later, Cassie and Steve are engaged - but they have yet to meet. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antwane & Tony
programme.desc: Nev and Max are contacted by Carmen who is sounding the alarm on behalf of her cousin, Antwane. He's been in a 3-year romance with a man named Tony that he met on a telephone chat line. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Ray is determined to meet his online love Lexi. After learning that her sister has meddled in their relationship in the past, Nev and Max find themselves asking more questions. (S5, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike and Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid? (S2, ep16)

programme.desc: Snooki gets caught stealing from a stripper, Vinny is feeling tempted and might sin, and Pauly D is looking for love.

programme.desc: Ex on the Beach will see eight single guys and girls head to an idyllic beach to enjoy a summer holiday in paradise. That is until all of their ex's show up!

programme.desc: The fourth Ex arrives at the beach. Ross feels Chloe's wrath as his relationship with Vicky advances, Talitha and Ash hit the rocks. Marco and Frankie reach breaking point over Emily.

programme.desc: The fifth Ex arrives at the beach to surprise Vicky and Ross, things look increasingly bad for Talitha and there's a shock departure which leaves everyone panicking over whose Ex is next?

programme.desc: Bryan and Megan have been best friends for 10 years and he can no longer keep his feeling contained. Kenise thinks that she and James can be more than workout buddies.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.desc: Mr Beasleys pipes and boiler are making banging noises and Bob is called in to replace them. Whilst Bob and Wendy are collecting the new Boiler from JJ, Molly explains that she is looking after Mrs Broadbents baby rabbits.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bobs built a new waterwheel for the old watermill. Hes made it at the yard, but now needs to dismantle it to take it to the mill in sections. Bob needs Benny, Scoop, Lofty and Muck to carry the wheel sections through the marshland to the mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are drilling a special well at their homestead. The well has its own water tank, which needs to be raised from the ground on rocks. Wendy and Scrambler arrive for the first ever time in Sunflower Valley..

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and Dizzy have spent the night at Bobs old yard in Bobsville to help Wendy with some digging and mixing. The machines all wish that Wendy could come and live out in Sunflower Valley.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan's shady ex-girlfriend turns to him for help when her latest scam takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team faces its most dangerous mission yet: stopping a group of eco-terrorists.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is upset with Adam, who tells him that he was entrusted to keep a secret and leaves after talking to that person. The man is looking for someone and is willing to kill anyone to get to that person.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team goes undercover to investigate unexplained deaths in a prison.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar is sent undercover in a deadly high-tech assassination ring, to find why they want Adam dead.

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Highjacked
programme.desc: With a reporter on board, the Taelon mother ship is highjacked into interdimensional space. Liam is the prime suspect, causing an even bigger rift between Da'an and Zo'or. As the ship floats, lost in space, they must find the real culprit.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Defector
programme.desc: A shuttle crashes on a beach after being pursued by a second Taelon piloted shuttle. When Liam locates the survivor (a Taelon called Belleye), he claims to want to help the Resistance take back Earth from the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Heroes and Heartbreak
programme.desc: Augur is recruited by a Taelon weapons project, but the others are worried about his involvement. When the project is launched earlier than originally planned to fight a Jiridian fleet, the Earth is in danger.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A Jiridian probe headed for Earth is shot down by the Taelon Embassy and crashes outside of D.C. Liam recovers the probe, but he, Augur, and Julia are captured by another underground resistance movement led by the real Colonel Liam Kincaid.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crossfire
programme.desc: As the election draws near, Liam believes Zo'or is trying to have Jonathan Doors murdered. The Resistance worries that an attack is imminent at the final debate. Julia mobilizes a group to protect Doors against Liam's wishes.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crackdown
programme.desc: An unknown woman saves Augur and Liam from the raids on the Resistance. Lili sabotages the mother ship, but Zo'or stops its total destruction. Lili is reportedly dead. The investigation on the President's shooter continues.

programme.title: The Lost World: Nectar
programme.desc: To retrieve an antidote that will save professor Summerlee from deadly venom, the explorers must venture into a bee hive that no human has ever made it out of alive.

programme.title: The Lost World: Cave of Fear
programme.desc: Professor Challenger is taken hostage. To save him, the group, goes into the cave of fear to retrieve bones for a ritual offering. In the process, they revisit the dark corners of their past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation
programme.desc: Summerlee saves an unconscious child from a river with CPR, which convinces the village leader they are witches. They will be burned on the stake unless they can influence the council otherwise.

programme.title: The Lost World: Blood Lust
programme.desc: Marguerite and Professor Challenger must save Roxton when he gets bit by a diseased man and transforms into a Vampire. Meanwhile, Veronica proves to two men that she doesn't belong to either of them.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of Time
programme.desc: Marguerite, the reincarnation of the Druid's priestess, must fulfill her destiny by retrieving emeralds that will save them. Veronica has difficulty giving up a baby she has grown attached to.

programme.title: The Lost World: Paradise Found
programme.desc: While searching for Veronica's parents, the explorers find themselves in a hidden land of paradise. They must resist temptation when they discover a magical fruit that promises immortality.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: DJs Janice Long and Ken Bruce embark on a trip around Oxfordshire with Christina Trevanion and Paul Laidlaw. They're looking for antiques that will make money at auction, but spare a moment for buses and the early days of music recording.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Dinnerladies Anne Reid and Thelma Barlow join Paul Laidlaw and David Harper for a trip around Oxfordshire. Armed with a classic car and 400 each, the teams take in wartime artwork then compete at auction in Penkridge, Staffordshire.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Simon Williams and Duncan Preston join James Lewis and Philip Serrell for a trip around Essex, looking for items to auction in Torquay, Devon. On the way, Duncan tries an ancient craft and someone has a tale to tell about Boris Johnson.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The sixth Doctor Who, Colin Baker, joins the first Doctor's assistant, Peter Purves, exploring Herefordshire and Worcestershire in a TARDIS disguised as a 1970 Morris Minor. Experts Will Axon and James Braxton help them navigate.

programme.desc: John O'Shea joins Chris Murphy on Tungsten Talk to reflect on his career.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk

programme.title: Scott Mitchell- On the Farm

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Megan is left speechless with a big surprise from new boyfriend Tel. Poor Amber ends up back in hospital. Chloe starts singing lessons and Emma's wish comes true. (S7, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Sassi is heartbroken that Zenaya prefers staying with her dad. Mia tries to build bridges with Manley. Lockdown leaves Amber feeling depressed. Chloe resists suggestion of Baby no. 2. (S8, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Sassi blows up at being mugged off by Darren, Jordan makes a life changing decision, Amber and Ste clash and Mia gets big news about her Dad's health. (S8, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Jordan has to hide a big secret from Chloe, Ste drops a bombshell. Mia faces some new parenting hurdles. Sassi piles the pressure on Darren, and he snaps. (S8, ep3)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Mia moves house but things go horribly wrong. Jordan splashes out on the ring, a desperate Sassi needs help with Zenaya's learning. Ste tries to put the pieces together from his childhood. (S8, ep4)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Hollywood Secrets
programme.desc: The investigation into the 2008 murder of Juliana Redding, an aspiring actress and model and the subsequent trial. Redding was found dead in her Santa Monica, California home

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A New York dentist denies killing his lover's husband -- who was also his best friend.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Dirty Little Secrets
programme.desc: In April 2006, Matt Baker, a pastor from Waco, Texas, returned home to find his wife Kari unconscious, with an empty bottle of Unisom and a suicide note beside her. Police ruled it a suicide. However, her family believed otherwise.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Missing Molly
programme.desc: A report on the unsolved abduction and murder of 16-year-old Molly Bish. Bish disappeared in June 2000 from the local swimming hole. In May 2003, Tim McGuigan, a former police officer, helped discover evidence that lead to the discovery of Mollys body.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: The investigation of the September 24, 1988 sexual torture-murder in Louisville, Kentucky, of Brenda Sue Schaefer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: In 1976, Deborah Gardner, a Peace Corps worker, was murdered while on assignment in the South Pacific island nation of Tonga. Dennis Priven, a 24-year-old fellow Peace Corps worker, who appeared to be obsessed with Gardner, was charged by Tongan police.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Windom Earle sets his sites on the Miss Twin Peaks contest. Lucy chooses a father for her baby. Leo is punished when he frees Major Briggs. Cooper unlocks the key to entering the Black Lodge. Annie and Dale make a commitment to each other.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Agent Cooper follows Windom Earle and Annie into the depths of the Black Lodge. Big Ed and Norma get a shock when Nadine suffers head trauma. Andrew and Pete unlock Eckhardt's final box while Audrey stages her act of civil disobedience.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The small northwest town of Twin Peaks, Washington is shaken up when the body of the Homecoming Queen, Laura Palmer, is discovered washed up on a riverbank, wrapped in plastic.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Agent Cooper enjoys the comforts of the Great Northern Hotel. Bobby Briggs and Mike Nelson are released from jail. Doctor Hayward hands over the autopsy report on Laura Palmer.
